title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI and Python/JS libraries to pull, run and chat with 70+ GGUF models locally; includes REST API, Docker image, and built-in model registry.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python client for the Ollama API; stream chat, embed, list, create, copy, delete models.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client (npm: ollama) with identical API surface to the Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package (pip: langchain-ollama) providing LLM, chat, embeddings and tool-calling wrappers.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Full-featured, open-source ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama; supports multi-user, RAG, model builder, OpenAI-compat endpoints.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library (Maven Central) wrapping Ollama’s REST endpoints with sync/async builders.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for Ollama; generate, chat, embed, list, pull models with idiomatic Ruby blocks.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI with syntax highlighting, conversation history, and key-bindings inspired by k9s.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Visual Studio Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement with inline suggestions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and PVC model cache.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & CUDA) with multi-arch support and docker-compose examples.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset allowing Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET Standard 2.0 client for Ollama with async enumerable streaming and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-copilot-vim
summary: Vim/Neovim plugin for AI code completion powered by any Ollama model; supports multi-line fills and accept/reject shortcuts.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI service that proxies Ollama with OpenAI-compatible chat/completions and embeddings endpoints plus rate-limiting.

title: ollama-spring-boot-starter
summary: Spring Boot auto-configuration exposing Ollama as @OllamaClient beans with WebFlux streaming.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal Python RAG example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store to chat over local documents.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that lets servers chat with any Ollama model via slash commands and thread support.

title: ollama-macos-menu
summary: Native macOS menu-bar app to start/stop Ollama services and quickly switch models from the status bar.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package providing TypeScript bindings for the Ollama REST API with 20k weekly downloads.
